~Bear Fortitude~.Effect:
The Bear gains Shielding equal to 3 + (Your Level).
Lasts up to 1 hour.
~Bear Fortitude~.Notes: For Druids, the Shielding disappears if Shapeshift is cancelled.

~Maul~.Effect:
The target must pass a Might Check or take 1d4 Damage (1d10 if Shapeshift) and be Stunned.
Takes half of the Damage if it passes.

~Swiping Claw~.Effect: All Units around the Bear take 4 Slash Damage (12 Damage if Druid).

~Ferocity~.Effect: Critical Strike - If you rolled maximum on the Wolf's Pet Attack, deal another 1d6 Damage.
~Ferocity~.Notes: Applies to Animal Attack if it's not a pet.

~Leap~.Range: Exactly 3 meters range, no more, no less.
~Leap~.Effect:
The Wolf leaps at a target (near it).
The target rolls a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, the target is Dazed.

~Prowl~.Effect:
The first Attack of the Large Cat in a combat ignores the target's Defense.
The Cat and it's owner leave no tracks and can see in the Darkness (10 meters).
The Cat and it's owner have Proficiency in Stealth (see Proficiencies).

~Rake~.Effect:
A target must pass a Dexterity Check or take 1d8 Damage (3d8 for Shapeshift) and be Crippled.
Takes half of the Damage if it passes.
Does not work on Units that can't bleed.

~Elk Flank~.Effect: The Elk's first Flank Attack every turn deals 1 extra Damage.

~Rideable Steed~.Effect: You (or an ally) can ride your Elk as if you were Trained in riding. The Elk's speed is 8 when not in combat.

~Majestic Buffet~.Effect:
Use this after you used Pet Attack.
The same target makes a Charisma Check.
If it fails, it is Charmed (by the pet).
~Majestic Buffet~.Notes: If you are a Druid, use this after you performed a melee attack.

~Spikes~.Effect: After a Unit makes a melee Attack on the Porcupine, it takes 1d4 Pierce Damage.

~Quillshot~.Effect: All Units within 3 meters of the Porcupine are shot with arrow-like quills and take 2d6 + 2 Pierce Damage.

~Poison Fangs~.Effect: Giant Spider Attacks deal +1d6 extra Poison Damage to targets already affected by Crowd Control (except Slows).

~Web~.Effect: A target must pass a Dexterity Check or be Rooted.

~Talons~.Effect:
Bird of Prey attacks have 2 meters range.
An enemy starting its turn near the Bird of Prey is Slowed.

~Beak Poke~.Effect:
A Unit near the Bird of Prey must pass a Dexterity Check or take 2d4 Pierce Damage (2d10 + 1 for Shapeshift) and be Blinded.
Takes half of the Damage if it passes.

~Stampede~.Effect: If the Gorilla moves in a straight line at least 3 meters and then Pet Attacks, the Attack deals +1d4 Damage.

~Fling Over~.Effect:
A Unit near the Gorilla must pass a Might Check or take 1d6 Smash Damage and be thrown up to 3 meters in any direction,
If it collides with another Unit or an obstacle/wall, they both take an extra 1d6 Smash Damage.

Dragon Wyrm.Description:
This small to medium sized dragon has a color and an element specific to it (Fire/Cold/Shock/Acid/Poison).
That element is called the Dragon Wyrm Element.

~Element Resistance~.Effect:
The Dragon Wyrm's Pet Attacks have 3 meters range and the Damage type is the Dragon Wyrm's element.
You and your pet take only 50% Damage from the Dragon Wyrm Element.
~Element Resistance~.Upgrade:
If you get a Dragon Wyrm as an Animal Companion, you choose its element when you get it.
If you're a Druid, you must choose the element every time you Shapeshift into the Dragon Wyrm.
The element choices are Fire, Cold, Shock, Necrotic, Poison, Acid.
~Element Resistance~.Notes: Applies to Animal Attack if it's not a pet.

~Dragon Breath~.Effect:
The pet breathes its Dragon Wyrm Element in a 3x1 meter line.
Targets roll a Grade 12 Dexterity Check.
They take 2d8 Damage (4d8 if Druid) if they fail, and half of that if they succeed.

Owlbolg.Description: An Owlbolg is an ape-like owl creature with an innate spell casting Talent.

~Owl Bolt~.Effect:
Owlbolg's Pet Attacks have 10 meters range and shoot a magical missile that deals Force Damage.
Owlbolgs can use Scrolls and Potions for 1 Action.
~Owl Bolt~.Notes: Applies to Animal Attack if it's not a pet.

~Quicken Spell~.Effect: The Owlbolg casts a Spell you know that takes Half-Action.
~Quicken Spell~.Notes: If the Spell has a Cooldown, it goes on Cooldown. If it costs something to cast it, you must still spend that cost.

~Druid Spellcasting~.Effect: As a Druid, while Shapeshifted into an Owlbolg, you can cast Spells.

~Blood Vim~.Effect: Every turn, you have an extra Half-Action.
~Blood Vim~.Notes: ...or Action if you somehow got this as a pet.

~Hunger Claws~.Effect: The Lycanthrope Animal Attacks heal for 50% of the Damage rolled. However, for each Half-Action spent not Animal Attacking, the Lycanthrope takes 5 True Damage.

~Ominous Howl~.Effect: All Units that can hear you become Feared.

Golem.Description:
A golem is an artificial life form created from a durable material.
When creating the golem, choose the material - clay, metal, flesh.
A golem's size is Large.
It has different abilities based on its material.

~Attack~.Effect: Deals 1d8 + Your Highest Stat Smash Damage.

~Clay - Earth Rumble~.Effect: All enemies within 4 meters of the Golem take 8 Shock Damage and become Slowed.

~Metal - Iron Curtain~.Effect: The Golem provides Cover to all allies within 1 meter of it (but not to itself).

~Flesh - Incite Fear~.Effect:
All enemies within 4 meters of the Golem must pass a Sense Check or be Feared by the Golem and take 1d8 + 4 Necrotic Damage.
If they pass, they take half of that Damage.

~Shield Bash~.Effect: If you roll 6 on the Pet Attack die, the target must pass a Might Check or be Crippled and pushed 3 meters away.
~Shield Bash~.Notes: Requires to be next to the target.

~Routing Squire~.Effect: When the Squire comes within 1 meter of a Worhty Enemy, it gains 3 Shielding. Then it can't gain the Shielding from the same Enemy for the rest of the combat.

~Quickfoot~.Effect: Has 6 Movement Speed and can Break its Movement.

~Backstab~.Effect: The Squire's Flank Attacks deal an extra 1d4 Damage.

~Camouflage~.Effect: The Squire becomes effectively invisible to Units more 3 or more meters away from it.

~Magic Attack~.Effect: Pet Attack has 5 meter range and the Damage type can be Fire, Cold or Shock.

~Spellcasting~.Effect: Using its Action, the Squire can cast any Basic Ability up to Level 5 from the Elemental, Arcane, Conjuration or Mysticism schools that cost no Mana and deals no Damage. The Squire can cast such Abilities a total of 3 times per Adventure, irrespective of those Abilities' Cooldowns.

~Blinding Light~.Effect: A target must pass a Dexterity Check or be Blinded.

~Freedom~.Range: Use when an Ally becomes affected by a Crowd Control. Remove that Crowd Control from it.
~Freedom~.Notes: Doesn't work for area persistent CC like Hard Terrain, fog-like effects, etc.
